metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000862 jenkins: workspace browser allowed accessing files outside the workspace (SECURITY-904) (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: An information exposure vulnerability exists in Jenkins 2.153 and earlier, LTS 2.138.3 and earlier in DirectoryBrowserSupport.java that allows attackers with the ability to control build output to browse the file system on agents running builds beyond the duration of the build using the workspace browser.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
